ne7:1.5: Ajjhosānalakkhaṇā taṇhā, tassā piyarūpaṁ sātarūpaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ.
ne7:1.7: Vaṇṇasaṇṭhānabyañjanaggahaṇalakkhaṇā subhasaññā, tassā indriyā saṁvaro padaṭṭhānaṁ.
ne7:1.9: Saṅkhatalakkhaṇānaṁ dhammānaṁ asamanupassanalakkhaṇā niccasaññā, tassā viññāṇaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ.
ne7:1.11: Sabbadhammasampaṭivedhalakkhaṇā vijjā, tassā sabbaṁ neyyaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ.
ne7:1.13: Icchāvacarapaṭisaṁharaṇalakkhaṇo alobho, tassa adinnādānā veramaṇī padaṭṭhānaṁ.
ne7:1.14: Abyāpajjalakkhaṇo adoso, tassa pāṇātipātā veramaṇī padaṭṭhānaṁ.
ne7:1.18: Saṅkhatalakkhaṇānaṁ dhammānaṁ samanupassanalakkhaṇā aniccasaññā, tassā uppādavayā padaṭṭhānaṁ.
ne7:2.1: Pañca kāmaguṇā kāmarāgassa padaṭṭhānaṁ, pañcindriyāni rūpīni rūparāgassa padaṭṭhānaṁ, chaṭṭhāyatanaṁ bhavarāgassa padaṭṭhānaṁ, nibbattabhavānupassitā pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇadassanassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
ne7:2.2: Okappanalakkhaṇā saddhā adhimuttipaccupaṭṭhānā ca, anāvilalakkhaṇo pasādo sampasīdanapaccupaṭṭhāno ca.
ne7:3.1: Aparo nayo, assādamanasikāralakkhaṇo ayonisomanasikāro, tassa avijjā padaṭṭhānaṁ.
ne7:3.20: Imāni bhavaṅgāni yadā samaggāni nibbattāni bhavanti so bhavo, taṁ saṁsārassa padaṭṭhānaṁ.
ne7:4.1: Titthaññutā pītaññutāya padaṭṭhānaṁ, pītaññutā pattaññutāya padaṭṭhānaṁ, pattaññutā attaññutāya padaṭṭhānaṁ, attaññutā pubbekatapuññatāya padaṭṭhānaṁ, pubbekatapuññatā patirūpadesavāsassa padaṭṭhānaṁ, patirūpadesavāso sappurisūpanissayassa padaṭṭhānaṁ, sappurisūpanissayo attasammāpaṇidhānassa padaṭṭhānaṁ, attasammāpaṇidhānaṁ sīlānaṁ padaṭṭhānaṁ, sīlāni avippaṭisārassa padaṭṭhānaṁ, avippaṭisāro pāmojjassa padaṭṭhānaṁ, pāmojjaṁ pītiyā padaṭṭhānaṁ, pīti passaddhiyā padaṭṭhānaṁ, passaddhi sukhassa padaṭṭhānaṁ, sukhaṁ samādhissa padaṭṭhānaṁ, samādhi yathābhūtañāṇadassanassa padaṭṭhānaṁ, yathābhūtañāṇadassanaṁ nibbidāya padaṭṭhānaṁ, nibbidā virāgassa padaṭṭhānaṁ, virāgo vimuttiyā padaṭṭhānaṁ.
ne7:4.3: Evaṁ yo koci upanissayo yo koci paccayo, sabbo so padaṭṭhānaṁ.
